case.name: No bra
case.description: Futaba just removed her tank top, revealing that she wasn't wearing a bra.

trigger.state: Well, this is me. What little there is.
I’m not going to play a game I can’t see, where I have to listen to people drone on, so the headphones and glasses stay.

case.name: No panties
case.description: Futaba just removed her shorts, revealing she wasn't wearing any underwear.

trigger.state: Shoot. It all fell down. And I coincidentally forgot to wear underwear. (Is the seduction working?)
Oh... no... Everyone’s seen my p-p-I’m not going to say that word, it’s too much! But yeah, I didn’t bring panties to this.

case.name: Jukebox
case.description: Futaba asks the party what kidn of music they like to listen to.

trigger.state: They won't let me stream my music to the jukebox. Anyone else have suggestions for music?
